entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.content:
So I've had people telling me for a while to start up a blog and seeing as though I'm almost finished a fairly large OSS project, I figured now was as good as time as any.

More to come!
entry.summary: So I've had people telling me for a while to start up a blog and seeing as though I'm almost finished a fairly large OSS project, I figured now was as good as time as any.
